6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Yazid bin Abi Habib that Abu Al-Khair told him:"Abu Tamim Al-Jaishani stood up to pray two Rak'ahs before Maghrib, and I said to 'Uqbah bin 'Amir: 'Look at this man, what prayer is he praying?' He turned and looked at him, and said: 'This is a prayer that we used to pray at the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ قَبْلَ الْمَغْرِبِ
